A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
NOTHING could've prepared me for how BAD this was! 
This doesn't just scrape the bottom of the barrel\, it burrows beneath it and digs into a black abyss\, taking us all with it.

EDIT: Audience rating 49%?? Not a chance! Look through these reviews.
